title: India’s Sarvam wants to bring its AI models to feature phones, cars, and smart glasses
description: The company is using edge models that take up only megabytes of space, can run on most phones with existing processors, and can work offline.
content: The company is using edge models that take up only megabytes of space, can run on most phones with existing processors, and can work offline.
